commit message: Add changelog details for 1.8.6
Correct version number of 1.8.6 release
Rephrase changelog of 1.8.6 release
Updated to fix error running under Android Studio 0.8.4+
Show past events of specific color(s) #138
Fixed duplication of past and current events

Merge pull request #166 from yvolk/feature138

Show past events of specific color(s)
calendar-widget-165 Calendar widget does not appear in list of widgets

Merge pull request #168 from yvolk/calendar-widget-138

calendar-widget-165 Calendar widget does not appear in list of widgets
Preferences restructured. New 'Event filters' header introduced to allow further filtering enhancements
Merge branch 'walles/show-empty-days' of https://github.com/walles/calendar-widget into walles-walles/show-empty-days

1. Fixed: Blank date headers should start from Today, not earlier.
2. Background color of Past date headers is set according to 'Past events background color' setting now.

Merge pull request #171 from yvolk/master

1. Preferences restructured. New 'Event filters' header introduced
2. Added preference 'Show days without events'.
3. Background color of Past date headers is set according to 'Past events background color' setting.
Fixed: Background color of past events' day headers was not updated (until reboot)
Fixed crash on new install #138
Fixed #120 Manual instant sync: Refresh button added to a widget header
Adjusted default past event background color
#120: Colors of 'Refresh' icons changed to be the same as for existing Widget header icons
Translations updated
Implemented #156: Add a 'Today' option on 'Date Range'
#122: Added 'Events that ended recently' option. Readme updated with a list of recent changes
Changed wording #122
Fixed problem with outdated time zone by updating Joda-Time library in build.gradle (Note: pom.xml was not updated)
Translations updated
Update gradle plugin version to 1.1.0 and sdk version to 22

Update the refresh icon to use the material design refresh icon

The change also scales down the icon so that they have the same size as
the other toolbar icons.

https://github.com/google/material-design-icons/blob/master/navigation/svg/production/ic_refresh_24px.svg
Updating build-tools to 22.0.1 in .travis.yml
Remove deprecated maven pom.xml file
Update english text strings for event filter preferences
Update gradle android plugin to 1.2.3 and buildToolsVersion to 22.0.1
Update gradle version to 2.4
Add android-22 as dependent component to travis.yml file
Fix problem where past events would be shown back to timestamp == 0
Reintroduced enum to get the period for past events
Add ability to show all past events with a custom color
Remove log statements
Fix problem where past events would not be shown beyond current day
Reverting recent deletions to start over
Update gradle android plugin to 1.2.3 and buildToolsVersion to 22.0.1
Update gradle version to 2.4
Add android-22 as dependent component to travis.yml file
Update theme colors for preferences to be more in line with material design on v21+
Make the project compilable in AIDE

In the 'Events that ended recently' filter 'One day ago' option replaced with 'Yesterday'.
Fixed this filter.
Copyright header removed. (We will add unified Licence/Copyright header later as a separate step)

'Past events with color' option replaced with 'Show all past events with Default color'.
Unused translations removed.
Added 1. 'All events' group to 'Event Filters' and 2. 'Hide based on keywords in a title' option in the group.

Summaries of preferences at the 'Event Filters' fragment show status of these preferences, not their descriptions,
as recommended at https://www.google.com/design/spec/patterns/settings.html#settings-flow-structure
Changelog updated

1. 'Show all past events with Default color' changed to 'Show all past events having Default color'.
2. '(this option is turned off)' changed to '(disabled)'.
3. The 'Show all past events having Default color' doesn't have any summary now.
Default->default color. Change log updated
Translations updated
Translations updated
Rephrase several entries in the 1.9 changelog
